extendedInfo.description: Daily Bible Devotion gives you daily devotionals and bible verses that are inspirational, easy to understand and grows your relationship with God.  Share this with others even those who aren't saved or church goers. Each day a new devotional will be delivered to the app. Enjoy and God bless!* A new bible devotional is delivered to your app each day.* Each devotional comes with a way to apply it to your life.* Share any devotional with your friends and family.* Save your favorite devotionals to read later or to reference.A great way to receive your daily bread. Remember, you will also get a life application for each bible verse and scripture.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this app...it still would be nice to have more about marriage and spouses but other then that its great and I understand it so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this inspiring app, gives you something new everyday & motivates me  to better myself!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I love this app i have been trying to find a good bible devotion but this one has caught my heart i havent really picked up my bible of late but having this has help me read daily
reviews.author: Bryan Johnson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Very practical methods of injecting scripture into everyday life. I love that it is user friendly and the notifications means you never miss a beat. Just wish there was an evening notification.
reviews.author: Amara Francis

reviews.title: Too short!!!!!\"
reviews.comment: This app is wayyy to short..when reading a devotional I want to truly be able to get DETAILED relatable advice..well this app completely lacks detail .dissapointed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Every day
reviews.comment: Every morning I read it and is how I start my day reading the word of God and makes me realize and think about the word of God is a great perfect way to start yr day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app. I enjoy reading daily for inspiration and guidance. I love God and I\'m sooooooo thankful for his word!
reviews.author: LaRhonda Livingston

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is a great app, every day learning Bible versus and having an inspirational message following it. 5 plus stars I highly recommended!!
reviews.author: Carl Farrar

reviews.title: Great Bible Study App
reviews.comment: I really like this app because it has daily devotion and also links to a commentary and other Bible translations. I would have given 5 stars if it was a little more user friendly.
reviews.author: Roxanne Schiele

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love the addition of Bible trivia its very enlightening to learn these new facts about the Bible.
reviews.author: lyndra stacker

reviews.comment: Quick, great daily devotional! Very easy to understand and meaningful to read.
reviews.author: Jessica Okorie-Dwumfour

reviews.title: Awesomer...
reviews.comment: I already loved this and have used for a yr almost.  What im lovn now is the bible trivia! Excellent idea.  One suggestion, for the answer, plz include bible verse where it comes from. Thx. Gr8 work.
reviews.author: Dee S.

reviews.title: NLT !!!
reviews.comment: NLT is great for devotions!  Other versions ( NKJ - KJV - STRONGS... ) are good for deeper study, but that\'s not what this particular app is for.  Check out \"Cadre Bible\" for that. Love this concise devotional app - Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: I enjoy every morning reading  daily devotional Bible. It inspires me. This is a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is awesome!! It\'s a great way to start & finish your day for people that don\'t have a lot of time.  Great!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great application. Very helpful and inspiring. God richly bless you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daily Bible Devotion
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. I love that I get a morning and evening devotion and I also can read it in different bible versions. If I could rate ten stars I would. Keep up the great job.
reviews.author: Dionne Wilson

reviews.comment: Love it! Love it! You will love It too.. may God bless you! And always remember God loves you also, so smile!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daily Devotion
reviews.comment: Awesome! Available when I need it! Love the simple nonintrusive reminders. Thanks for helping me abide.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Translations
reviews.comment: Have you read the new \"Word remix\"? It\'s awesome, easy to read & understand. It would be a nice addition to all of the translations you now have.
reviews.author: A Google User
